ISSUE.TITLE: add appropriate content-type headers for XML feed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: When I view a granary feed in chrome, I see a lot of text. When I view other feeds, chrome renders it as an XML tree. I see granary sets a content-type header of `text/xml` which I would have thought would work, but on a feed that looks right in the browser I see that the content type is `application/xml`.
